name: Magical Ball
description:
Worked on this one alone.

Ï did the code, art and for the first time tried to make the "music", the sound effect for breaking the mirrors was from freesound.org by nick121087 - glass-break.

The controls are WASD, with space you can fast restart the game. 

(Also E pause the player movement and Q continues, in case you press those ones by mistake ) :)
